Settings.QueryText: SELECT VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) AS Ref, FALSE AS DeletionMark, 1 AS PictureIndex, CAST("" AS String(150)) AS Description, CAST("" AS String(500)) AS Definition, VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) AS Author, DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) AS CreationDate, VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) AS Edited, DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) AS EditDate, DATETIME(1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0) AS ChangeDate, 0 AS Size, FALSE AS DigitallySigned, FALSE AS Encrypted, -1 AS PictureNumberDigitallySignedEncrypted, FALSE AS FileIsEditing, FALSE AS FileCurrentUserIsEditing, FALSE AS FileEditedByAnotherUser, VALUE(Catalog.Users.EmptyRef) AS IsEditing

v8:item.v8:content: Names of the form button items

Пометить текущий элемент на удаление / Снять пометку

Занять файл и открыть для редактирования

Сохранить и освободить файл в информационной базе

Сохранить файл вместе с электронной подписью
